Running around

To keep moving a bit, I have started to run (the only sport that currently fits into my current schedule), and as of January 1st 2016, I begun participating in some races. Here they are:

2016

  • Marana Egg Nog Jog Jan 1st 2016: 5k @ 29:50 min.
    My very first running race, and I achieved my goal to stay under 30 minutes.
  • Griffin Gallop at Green Fields School Jan 31st 2016: 5k @ 27:58 min.
    An improvement. yay!
  • Marana 5k March 15 2016: 5k @ 27:11 min.
    Also an improvement, but now I should really think about how to get faster.
